quotes: I really wanted to thank you for your site and the service provided: elegant, simple and effective, it has brought us much comfort in this difficult period.
carousel: Presenting InMemori during an appointment makes it 3 times more likely to be used.
Show the sample page to help the family understand InMemori.
Remind the family that they will be called by InMemori support team.

pages-list.info:
Vous ne trouvez pas ici un espace que vous avez créé ?
Cela signifie que la famille n’a pas souhaité se servir d’InMemori.
